email_body: -----Original Message----- From: "Simpkins, Michelle" <MSimpkins@winstead.com Sent: Thursday, August 02, 2001 7:15 AM To: 'pallen@enron.com' Cc: 'michaelb@amhms.com' Subject: First Amendment to Contract (Allen/AMHP) <<3MMP07!.DOC>> Phillip, Enclosed is the First Amendment for your execution. I just found out that you have been out of the office, so you may not have received the fax of the Amendment which I sent to you earlier in the week. Please review the enclosed document and contact me at (512) 370-2836 or Mike Bobinchuck with any questions or concerns. If there are no questions, please sign the Amendment and fax it me at (512) 370-2850. Thanks. Michelle L. Simpkins Winstead Sechrest & Minick P.C. 100 Congress Avenue, Suite 800 Austin, Texas 78701 (512) 370-2836 (512) 370-2850 Fax msimpkins@winstead.com - 3MMP07!.DOC
